ygData.subject: Re: A beautiful planet

::Battera::

She saw his arm go around her and blushed.  She didn't know what to 
do or say.   She had the same problem when Firearm was paying her all 
those compliments.  She just had no experience or knowlage of what to 
do in situations like this.  She just stood there looking out across 
the plains, blushing.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::WindRider::
> WindRider gazed out across the landscape."We will", he
> said to Battera. "Have faith in the Matrix." With that
> he reached to put his arm around her.
